name: The Panel
description:
Made for GMTK 2020 but submitted a minute too late, this is a short game where the main character cannot be directly controlled. Instead the player must use wires to connect flickering timers with the correct arrows to progress.

There are only 4 short levels at the moment, (and I think the last one is broken) but I should be able to make a lot more in the next few days.
